actors.name: text_1
actors.text:
Bullying is when someone hurts another
person on purpose, and it usually
happens more than once.

actors.name: text_3
actors.text: Hurting another person's body or things

actors.name: teacher
actors.text: Teachers: follow up on this lesson with offline activities found in your Act Now! Teacher's Guide.
